Sword Packaging for EASY Sword-v1

EASY supports a SWORD v1 interface for deposits of datasets. The zip file for a deposit must contain:

  • A single file in the root folder of the zip with metadata.

    • The name of the file must be: DansDatasetMetadata.xml
    • It must conform to the schema at ddm.xsd
    • A guide to the manual deposit can be found here: Guide (PDF). This document is written to be used in tandem with a manual deposit at https://easy.dans.knaw.nl. It provides definitions and examples of the Dublin Core elements and Terms that can be used in the DansDatasetMetadata.xml.
    • Example DDM files

  • A single folder:

    • The name of the folder must be: data
    • The full path name of datafiles should not exceed 252 characters.
    • See also: File formats, preferred formats and accepted formats (pdf).
